page.title: 04Wooler Mart.
page.content: In the last ten years{Wooler Mart.}has expanded rapidly.The stock numbers have risen from 120,000 to over 250,000 sold,to a total value of over Â£20,000,000. There is a very strong local support but business also comes from the Borders and South Notrthumberland.As well as regular sales of store cattle and sheep,Wooler Mart. also hold annual calf and lamb sales.Monday and Wednesday are regular Mart. days. The premises have been modernised making full use of the latest technol- ogy.They now have computerised accoun- ts,including V.D.U's in the Rostrums and an Electronic weighbridge.The hustle and bustle of Mart. days is part of the life of Wooler,when farme- rs and their wives come to do business and to shop.
